bibl.title: The Meaning of énorm€zv and the Possible addendum lexicis énorm°v. <anormizo, anormeo>
bibl.note: The existence of *énorm°v will need to be confirmed, and the entry in LSJ for énorm€zv ought to be altered to read: moor [a ship] upstream or offshore. See pp. 38-39, for references to the papyri. <anormeo, anormizo>
bibl.seg: CONNOLLY Andrew, The Meaning of énorm€zv and the Possible addendum lexicis énorm°v. <anormizo, anormeo>
